articles.author: Carolyn Y. Johnson
articles.title: How the coronavirus can kill people - The Washington Post
articles.description: When people die of the coronavirus, it’s not just the virus that kills them — it's their own immune system.
articles.content:
The difference between a lethal infection and one that feels like a bad cold probably hinges on the interaction between the virus and a persons immune system.
No one knows exactly how the coronavirus leads to respiratory failure in a subset of patients. But … [+4325 chars]
